original_text: So the men pursued after them on the way to the Jordan as far as the fords. And the gate was shut as soon as the pursuers had gone out.
korean_text: 그 사람들은 요단 나루터까지 그들을 쫓아갔고 그들을 뒤쫓는 자들이 나가자 곧 성문을 닫았더라

sentences.original_text: So the men pursued after them.
They were on the way to the Jordan.
They went as far as the fords.
This was right after the pursuers went out.
